skillTree.localised_description: Marauder mobs are awarded even greater mobility when riding their crude chariots of bone and wood, lashed together with the guts and sinew of the vanquished.

effects.description: Mount: Marauder Chariot

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

skillTree.localised_description: The slightest glance, the merest glimpse from one of the Dark Gods is sufficient to propel their playthings to ever-greater feats of desolation.

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord speaks with a dread booming voice - a gift from his Dark Masters to ensure obedience.

skillTree.localised_description: There can be no turning back for those whose souls are turning black.

skillTree.localised_description: There is no other choice. There never was.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee.

factionEffects.localised_description: Volrik Clawhand, touched by Tzeentch is a Kurgan Warlord dedicated to the ultimate schemer.

effects.description: Maximum active gifts: +1 for Gifts of Tzeentch
Ravenblessed: May gather grimoires and use these to recieve boons of Tzeentch and Chaos
Tzeentch's Chosen: Volrik will directly face the monsters hidden within the arcanum
Dedicated to Tzeentch: May only devote himself to Tzeentch
Has access to Changing of the Ways
Forces receive benefits for having high Winds of Magic

items.colour_text: Deep within the lands of the Kurgan the mighty warlord Volrik slowly succumbs to the gifts of the ultimate schemer. As he devotes himself to Tzeentch his following grows, all impressed by his grotesque mutations. His banner feared and renowned throughout the vast steppes, only his closest retinue may carry it in to battle.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +15
	(assigned unit)

Barrier hit points: +600
	(assigned unit)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: The Ravenblessed is Tzeentch's favoured Kurgan, unifying the tribes under the ultimate schemer's watchful gaze.
